info.title: &systemd; timers: Migrating from cron to &systemd; timers

abstract.para: All cron jobs can be migrated to &systemd; timers. Find instructions and an example here.

step.para: Create a service file executing the script. See for details.
Create a timer file executing the service file. See for general instructions.
Convert calendar entries. Time is specified differently in cron and &systemd;. Use the patterns below as a conversion template:
step.screen: Cron: Minute Hour Day Month DayOfWeek systemd: OnCalendar=DayOfWeek Year-Month-Day Hour:Minute:Second
step.para: To test the converted calendar entry, follow the instructions in .
Convert variable assignments. The &systemd; variable assignment must go into the [Service] section. You cannot convert MAILTO this way—refer to the next step for this.
Set up e-mail notifications to replace cron's MAILTO feature by following the instructions in .
